Surfrider

Surfrider had just updated their brand and they needed a new website to compliment it.

  • Client

    Surfrider

  • Role

    Design Lead

  • Team

    Blue State Digital

  • Live Site

    surfrider.org

surfrider.org

Surfrider Foundation approached Blue State Digital about a redesign in 2010.

Working closely with Wolasi Konu, we redesigned surfrider.org for action. In a really fun and collaborative process with the client, we were able to land on a design that presents an appropriate first impression of the organization and their goals. Let's keep these beaches clean so we can get out there and enjoy them!
